samples.ui
Interface EventListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
BuddyView, ButtonListView, Community, Dialog, LoginView, MazeRacer, RankingView, TermsView
public interface EventListener

Callback interface for event notification. This interface is used by the Component class to notify registered listeners of events. Listeners need to implement this interface to be able to register themselves.

See Also:
Component.addEventListener(samples.ui.EventListener), Component.removeEventListener(samples.ui.EventListener), Event.Event(java.lang.Object, int, java.lang.Object)

Method Summary
 boolean handleEvent(Event e)
          Instances of the Component class will call this method for registered listeners each time new events are available.
 

Method Detail

handleEvent

boolean handleEvent(Event e)
Instances of the Component class will call this method for registered listeners each time new events are available.

Parameters:
e - A user interface event.
